description: This script initializes an AI agent with specific configurations, manages session IDs, and queries the agent for responses related to capital cities and previous conversations, utilizing external modules for agent behavior, OpenAI models, and SQLite storage.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a language model, storage, and session management.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used by the agent.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of session data in an SQLite database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Sends a prompt to the agent and prints the response, associated with a specific session.
